what_went_well: Unified client-side environment variable mapping in next.config.mjs.
Implemented runtime dependency validation for feature flags.
Centralized implicit local state into the formal feature flag system.
what_could_improve: Headless test environment needs better mocks for Audio and OSMD to avoid noise in test results.

impact_assessment.technical_debt_reduction: High. Eliminated fragmented state management for core UI features.
impact_assessment.observability: Improved. All features can now be toggled via environment variables for easier debugging and A/B testing.
